title: Forward Thinking Leadership
description: I will also continue to lead on the important issues that our elected officials are not.

title: C-PACE Challenge
description: I challenge the other candidates to support private energy investments in Portsmouth by enacting Property-Assessed Clean Energy financing for Commercial buildings.

title: A Fresh Chance to Restore Council Credibility
description: The recent attempted charter amendments question the incumbent City Councilors' credibility on our Police leadership and specific ward representation.
